The three people found in the world [an3: A certain person makes hurtful choices by way of body, speech, and mind.
Another person makes pleasing choices by way of body, speech, and mind.
Another person makes both hurtful and pleasing choices by way of body, speech, and mind.
The consequences of the choices made by: The first person is reborn in a hurtful world
The second person is reborn in a pleasing world
The third person is reborn in a world that is both hurtful and pleasing
The feelings experienced by the three pe: The first person experiences hurtful feelings that are exclusively painful
The second person experiences pleasing feelings that are exclusively happy
The third person experiences both hurtful and pleasing feelings that are a mixture of pleasure and pain.
